content.text:
# List of systems biology visualization software

Online software
{| class="wikitable"
! Name
! Description || Site
|-
| GESTALT Workbench
| graphical workbench for analysis of large-scale genomic sequence data
||[http://db.systemsbiology.net/gestalt/]
|-
| N-Browse
| interactive graphical browser for biological networks
||[http://aquila.bio.nyu.edu/NBrowse2/NBrowse.html]
|-
| NetPath
| curated resource of human signal transduction pathways
||[http://www.netpath.org/]
|-
| MEGA
| free, online, open-source, phylogenetic analysis, drawing dendrograms etc.
||[http://www.megasoftware.net/]
|-
| REACTOME
| free, online, open-source, curated pathway database encompassing many areas of human biology
||[http://www.reactome.org/]
|-
| WikiPathways
| curate biological pathways
||[http://www.wikipathways.org/]
|-
| MetaboMAPS
| visualize omics data on shared metabolic pathways
||[https://metabomaps.brenda-enzymes.org/]
|}
Applications
{| class="wikitable"
! Name
! Description ||OS||License||Site
|-
| BioTapestry
| interactive tool for building, visualizing, and simulating genetic regulatory networks
||multiplatform (Java-based)||LGPL||[http://www.biotapestry.org]
|-
| Cytoscape
| data integration, network visualization, and analysis
||multiplatform (Java-based)||LGPL||[http://www.cytoscape.org/]
|-
| GenMAPP
| visualize and analyze genomic data in the context of pathways
||Windows||Apache License||[http://www.genmapp.org/]
|-
|MATLAB
|tool for modeling, simulating, and analyzing dynamic biological systems
|Windows, Linux, macOS
|Proprietary
|[https://www.mathworks.com/products/simbiology.html]
|-
| MEGA
| free, online, open-source, phylogenetic analysis, drawing dendrograms etc.
||Windows/DOS-Win/Mac/Linux||Shareware||[http://www.megasoftware.net/]
|-
| PathVisio
| tool for displaying and editing biological pathways
||multiplatform (Java-based)||Apache License||[http://www.pathvisio.org/]
|-
| InCroMAP
| tool for the integration of omics data and joint visualization of experimental data in pathways
||multiplatform (Java-based)||LGPL||[http://www.cogsys.cs.uni-tuebingen.de/software/InCroMAP/]
|-
| Pathview
| pathway based data integration and visualization, easy to use and integrate into pathway analysis
||multiplatform (R/Bioconductor)||GPL||[http://pathview.r-forge.r-project.org/] [http://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/pathview.html]
|-
| SBMLDiagrams
|| Python API to display and edit SBML layout/render extension || multiplatform || MIT || [https://github.com/sys-bio/SBMLDiagrams]
|-
| Systrip
| analysis of time-series data in the context of biological networks
||Windows, Linux||LGPL, GPL||[https://tulip.labri.fr/TulipDrupal/?q=systrip]
|}
References
